chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In today's video we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why Core Web Vitals are important

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Like this video and keep your high energy on the line

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The thing is that your website should be available in all devices like iPad, iPhone, Android, Surface Pro 4

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Because we have to give a good experience to all the users through our website

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In this video we will also learn that Chrome has a hidden tool called Lighthouse

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: and how you can use it to enhance your website

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So write in the comment section Sigma Batch OP

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen and let's roll the intro

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So guys I have come to my computer screen and I will make a new folder called Video 6

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And here I will open the VS Code as always

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And today I will tell you about SEO

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: First of all I want to tell you about SEO

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If you look at any website then it has SEO

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Let's take the example of Amazon.in

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I opened Amazon.in and it wants to load the website as soon as possible

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So that their products can be uploaded in the search engine

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Google is a search engine and it's responsibility is to show the best pages to the users

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So Google wants to show the pages that are fast, present information well

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: and also there are some things that the user has the best experience

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: For example there are two pages

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: One page has told about dog food

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The other page has also told about dog food

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: But page 2 loads very fast and Google will give it more preference

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Along with that there are Core Web Vitals

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: which Google considers to rank two pages

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: First of all there is content

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Content is the most important thing

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If your content is good then maybe your website can rank without Core Web Vitals

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: But if you are competing with a page that has presented similar quality content

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: then your Core Web Vitals will be seen

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And if your Core Web Vitals are good then you will be given preference

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So in Core Web Vitals, first of all there is CLS

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You see this video here which I have run from web.dev website

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You see that someone comes to your website and he is trying to cancel the order

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: and by mistake he cancelled the order and this thing on top of it became visible

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: and he shifted the layout and the order was completed

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: But the user wanted to click on no when the order was not completed

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In this case the user experience is very bad

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And as you have seen in this video, this should not happen

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So our CLS should be less

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now what is the definition of CLS?

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Cumulative Layout Shift means how much the page is shifting while loading

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Suppose you have loaded the page and you get to see this

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This was first on top and then when this part was loaded, it shifted down

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The layout should not shift if you put width and height in the images

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And LCP stands for Largest Contextual Paint

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This means that if the user is viewing a page, then the biggest element is loaded

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: For example, the biggest part in this is this image

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: How long is it loading?

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The whole page will be loaded but the biggest element which is the most important

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: How long is it loading?

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Web.dev and Google should have a good LCP score of 2.5 seconds

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In 2.5 seconds, the biggest element of the page should be loaded

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: After this comes the third metric which is FID

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Which stands for First Input Delay

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: First Input Delay means that if a user has clicked on any input element

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Like a button or any input on a page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Then how long does the input process take place

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: For example, if you have clicked on a button, then how long does the button click browser process

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And for Google and Web.dev, the input process should start in less than 100 ms

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So these were the 3 core web vitals which are very important

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: For your information, I will tell you that these core web vitals are updated

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: But these 3 are very important and you should know about them

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now I will show you what is Lighthouse report and why it is generated

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And how will these 3 core web vitals be evaluated

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So I will tell you here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If you will inspect it by right-clicking

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And it may be your right side, so you can click here and bring it down

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Or you can bring it here again and bring it down by clicking here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I prefer to bring it down because I am used to see it from the beginning

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now you can see the Lighthouse option here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Lighthouse generates a report and tells you what can be improved in your HTML page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: For example, if I want to see how my website looks on mobile

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So I will click on mobile or desktop and close this tab

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I will click on mobile and then on analyze page load

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So this will generate a report for me

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You can see here that a report has been generated

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Performance, accessibility, best practices, SEO and PWA

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: All these things are shown

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now you can see here that some things are shown in red

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Means the scope of improvement is in the page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now you can see that it tells you to size your images properly

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Your website can load 2.7 seconds faster

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So all these suggestions are given to you by Lighthouse

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If you incorporate these suggestions, your website will load well and give you a good experience

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now you can see that it says here that image elements do not have explicit width and height

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So you should give width and height

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You should use the width and height attribute that we had studied in the previous video

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So that your browser can reserve space

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: When we set width and height in HTML, space gets reserved in the browser

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Otherwise, if we don't set the height and width, then the browser won't know how much space to reserve

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And the time CSS loads, the page will shift down

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So we don't want our page to shift during loading time

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If our page starts shifting, then suppose we are going to click here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Then by mistake when it shifts, we might be clicking here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Suppose there was an image here, I am going to click here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And during the time I clicked, this image loaded and all the content shifted down

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And instead of clicking here by mistake, I will click on the image

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This is called cumulative layout shift

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So this kind of shift is not preferred by Google

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And it should be reduced

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: As you can see, this page has very less cumulative layout shift

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So we have to keep the cumulative layout shift at minimum

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So that our user can get a very good experience

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So here we get many more suggestions

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And this is for our mobile

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now we can generate desktop report

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And it will be generated

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So as you can see, it has generated a report

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In performance, it has 92 marks

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In accessibility, it has been given 100 out of 82

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In best practices, it has 75 marks

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now you can see here that all the good things have been told

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And all the scope of improvement that Lighthouse tells you

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So this is a hidden tool that you should use

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now I want to tell you about Meta text and Meta description

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So what I will do here is I will create a new file

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I will name it index.html

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And after creating an HTML file

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The first SEO element that I want to tell you is title

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If your title is reflecting the content of your page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Then this is a very good SEO practice

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Whenever your page is changing, you will make the title

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And you will make it so that it reflects the content of your page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Because if you want your website on Google, it will come according to the title

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So let's say you write here code with harry

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And you write like this

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So this is the title of the page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And this is the title of the page that YouTube has put

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This is the title of the page that Instagram has put

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This is the title of the page that GitHub has put

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So if the title is put on the page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And the title actually reflects the content of the page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Then your website will rank very well

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now let's say I put the content

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I put an h1

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I write harry

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And after that I write a paragraph

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I write lorem45

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now why did I write lorem45

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Let me do a view word wrap

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Why did I write 45

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I wrote 45 because I am lazy

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And 4 and 5 are around

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So I wrote 4 and 5

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I also write 23 because they are around

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So there is no other reason

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now I will preview it quickly

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now this document is written

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If I leave it like this, then it won't be a good SEO practice

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Let's say I write about harry

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I write code with harry

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Which is also my website

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And by doing this, my title will reflect here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: As you can see

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So by doing this kind of work

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: My website will have more chances to be seen in Google

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: By inspecting it, I will also take out its lighthouse report

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I will see what are the scope of improvements

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now its lighthouse report will be very good

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Because there is nothing that I should improve

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: But when I will put images, I will get suggestions like

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Put width

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Put height

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Along with that, I will tell you another trick

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: By which you can see your website in any mobile

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You will know this

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So you can click here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You can see the computer here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And if you select responsive

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Then you can see

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: How your website will be seen in any kind of device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So you can see whether your website is responsive or not

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: By doing this

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If you go to a specific device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In 12 Pro, your website will be seen in the resolution of iPhone 12 Pro

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now don't ask why it's not 15 or 16

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: 12 Pro means

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Bigger iPhone device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In such a big device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: How your website will be seen

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This is simply being told to you

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: So now you can see

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: How it will be seen in Surface Pro 7

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: By clicking here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: How it will be seen in Google phones

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: You can also know this

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And if you want to take a general view

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Of your website in responsive device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In any kind of device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Suppose in iPad

chunks.text: If you don't have a device

chunks.text: Then you can select responsive and select approximate width of your device

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: In all the widths

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Your website should be seen well

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I will tell you how this happens in this course

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Now if you click here again

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: The responsive view will be closed

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And as soon as it closes, your website will be seen like this

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I will close it

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I will come back here and tell you about Meta Text

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Here I will write

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: If I write here, then Meta DESC is coming

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: I will click on Meta DESC

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And I can give my page description here

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Suppose I give this is the page

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This is a page about

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: This is a page which contains

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Description

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: About Harry

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Ok

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: And here you can write whatever page content you have

chunks.Video: 6_SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML .mp3
chunks.text: Whatever you want, like I show you

text: In today's video we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why Core Web Vitals are important Like this video and keep your high energy on the line The thing is that your website should be available in all devices like iPad, iPhone, Android, Surface Pro 4 Because we have to give a good experience to all the users through our website In this video we will also learn that Chrome has a hidden tool called Lighthouse and how you can use it to enhance your website So write in the comment section Sigma Batch OP Let's go to the computer screen and let's roll the intro So guys I have come to my computer screen and I will make a new folder called Video 6 And here I will open the VS Code as always And today I will tell you about SEO First of all I want to tell you about SEO SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization If you look at any website then it has SEO Let's take the example of Amazon.in I opened Amazon.in and it wants to load the website as soon as possible So that their products can be uploaded in the search engine Google is a search engine and it's responsibility is to show the best pages to the users So Google wants to show the pages that are fast, present information well and also there are some things that the user has the best experience For example there are two pages One page has told about dog food The other page has also told about dog food But page 2 loads very fast and Google will give it more preference Along with that there are Core Web Vitals which Google considers to rank two pages First of all there is content Content is the most important thing If your content is good then maybe your website can rank without Core Web Vitals But if you are competing with a page that has presented similar quality content then your Core Web Vitals will be seen And if your Core Web Vitals are good then you will be given preference So in Core Web Vitals, first of all there is CLS You see this video here which I have run from web.dev website You see that someone comes to your website and he is trying to cancel the order and by mistake he cancelled the order and this thing on top of it became visible and he shifted the layout and the order was completed But the user wanted to click on no when the order was not completed In this case the user experience is very bad And as you have seen in this video, this should not happen So our CLS should be less Now what is the definition of CLS? Cumulative Layout Shift means how much the page is shifting while loading Suppose you have loaded the page and you get to see this This was first on top and then when this part was loaded, it shifted down The layout should not shift if you put width and height in the images The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP And LCP stands for Largest Contextual Paint This means that if the user is viewing a page, then the biggest element is loaded For example, the biggest part in this is this image How long is it loading? The whole page will be loaded but the biggest element which is the most important How long is it loading? Web.dev and Google should have a good LCP score of 2.5 seconds In 2.5 seconds, the biggest element of the page should be loaded After this comes the third metric which is FID Which stands for First Input Delay First Input Delay means that if a user has clicked on any input element Like a button or any input on a page Then how long does the input process take place For example, if you have clicked on a button, then how long does the button click browser process And for Google and Web.dev, the input process should start in less than 100 ms So these were the 3 core web vitals which are very important For your information, I will tell you that these core web vitals are updated But these 3 are very important and you should know about them Now I will show you what is Lighthouse report and why it is generated And how will these 3 core web vitals be evaluated So I will tell you here If you will inspect it by right-clicking And it may be your right side, so you can click here and bring it down Or you can bring it here again and bring it down by clicking here I prefer to bring it down because I am used to see it from the beginning Now you can see the Lighthouse option here Lighthouse generates a report and tells you what can be improved in your HTML page For example, if I want to see how my website looks on mobile So I will click on mobile or desktop and close this tab I will click on mobile and then on analyze page load So this will generate a report for me You can see here that a report has been generated Performance, accessibility, best practices, SEO and PWA All these things are shown Now you can see here that some things are shown in red Means the scope of improvement is in the page Now you can see that it tells you to size your images properly Your website can load 2.7 seconds faster So all these suggestions are given to you by Lighthouse If you incorporate these suggestions, your website will load well and give you a good experience Now you can see that it says here that image elements do not have explicit width and height So you should give width and height You should use the width and height attribute that we had studied in the previous video So that your browser can reserve space When we set width and height in HTML, space gets reserved in the browser Otherwise, if we don't set the height and width, then the browser won't know how much space to reserve And the time CSS loads, the page will shift down So we don't want our page to shift during loading time If our page starts shifting, then suppose we are going to click here Then by mistake when it shifts, we might be clicking here Suppose there was an image here, I am going to click here And during the time I clicked, this image loaded and all the content shifted down And instead of clicking here by mistake, I will click on the image This is called cumulative layout shift So this kind of shift is not preferred by Google And it should be reduced As you can see, this page has very less cumulative layout shift So we have to keep the cumulative layout shift at minimum So that our user can get a very good experience So here we get many more suggestions And this is for our mobile Now we can generate desktop report And it will be generated So as you can see, it has generated a report In performance, it has 92 marks In accessibility, it has been given 100 out of 82 In best practices, it has 75 marks Now you can see here that all the good things have been told And all the scope of improvement that Lighthouse tells you So this is a hidden tool that you should use Now I want to tell you about Meta text and Meta description So what I will do here is I will create a new file And I will name it index.html And after creating an HTML file The first SEO element that I want to tell you is title If your title is reflecting the content of your page Then this is a very good SEO practice Whenever your page is changing, you will make the title And you will make it so that it reflects the content of your page Because if you want your website on Google, it will come according to the title So let's say you write here code with harry And you write like this So this is the title of the page And this is the title of the page that YouTube has put This is the title of the page that Instagram has put This is the title of the page that GitHub has put So if the title is put on the page And the title actually reflects the content of the page Then your website will rank very well Now let's say I put the content And I put an h1 And I write harry And after that I write a paragraph And I write lorem45 Now why did I write lorem45 Let me do a view word wrap Why did I write 45 I wrote 45 because I am lazy And 4 and 5 are around So I wrote 4 and 5 I also write 23 because they are around So there is no other reason Now I will preview it quickly Now this document is written If I leave it like this, then it won't be a good SEO practice Let's say I write about harry And I write code with harry Which is also my website And by doing this, my title will reflect here As you can see So by doing this kind of work My website will have more chances to be seen in Google By inspecting it, I will also take out its lighthouse report And I will see what are the scope of improvements Now its lighthouse report will be very good Because there is nothing that I should improve But when I will put images, I will get suggestions like Put width Put height Along with that, I will tell you another trick By which you can see your website in any mobile You will know this So you can click here You can see the computer here And if you select responsive Then you can see How your website will be seen in any kind of device So you can see whether your website is responsive or not By doing this If you go to a specific device In 12 Pro, your website will be seen in the resolution of iPhone 12 Pro Now don't ask why it's not 15 or 16 12 Pro means Bigger iPhone device In such a big device How your website will be seen This is simply being told to you So now you can see How it will be seen in Surface Pro 7 By clicking here How it will be seen in Google phones You can also know this And if you want to take a general view Of your website in responsive device In any kind of device Suppose in iPad If you don't have a device Then you can select responsive and select approximate width of your device In all the widths Your website should be seen well I will tell you how this happens in this course Now if you click here again The responsive view will be closed And as soon as it closes, your website will be seen like this I will close it I will come back here and tell you about Meta Text Here I will write If I write here, then Meta DESC is coming I will click on Meta DESC And I can give my page description here Suppose I give this is the page This is a page about This is a page which contains Description About Harry Ok And here you can write whatever page content you have Whatever you want, like I show you Suppose you write what is SEO What is SEO you have written Here this page has put this Meta description SEO stands for this in simple terms Now it is not necessary that a search engine Will pass your Meta DESC If it likes it, then it will pass it And keep your Meta DESC here If you haven't put Meta DESC, then your content Can be generated from Meta DESC So this is the responsibility of the search engine What will Bing do, what will Google do, we don't know But from our side, our page should be To the point, especially if we are writing a blog And we want our page to rank organically So here you can see I have put Meta DESC The keyword used to be very good But now the Meta keyword Has been deprecated Meta keyword is not used at all Meta keyword's code looks like this But it is assumed that Meta keywords Don't rank in SEO Because people abuse it Suppose you have written a page about pets And you have written what is SEO in Meta keyword So it's not like your page will rank I will fix these double quotes So if I put Meta keyword here, then it is not necessary That the search engine will constrict it Search engines don't believe in Meta keywords They say that we don't want to see your Meta keywords So don't put them Meta keywords used to be very good But now it is not good, your page content is parsed And now AI is coming So your content will be understood What is the value of your content And it will be ranked accordingly Now if you want to know about these core web vitals For example, if I inspect it right click And go to Lighthouse And get a Lighthouse report for desktop Then some core web vitals come After that comes FCP First Contextual Paint Now you can see everything is 100% There was nothing much in this content But you can see here What is it doing? Pages with websocket cannot enter back forward There is websocket in this Because we are using this extension Live preview, otherwise it is good Accessibility is also good, everything is good It is a very good page PWA is Progressive Web Apps Which we will not make now Total Blocking Time, Cumulative Layout Shift Speed Index If you want to know about these First Contextual Paint is How long the user will be able to see How long it has been painted on the browser So if you want to see this You have to go to web.dev Web.dev is a very good website And you can see here They talk about this You can learn about these things If you want to learn PWA You can learn PWA There is a lot of good content But in this course We will focus on making HTML, CSS, JavaScript and websites This thing should have come to you Because of which I told you about it If you have not yet accessed Sigma Web Development Series Then do access it Access the playlist and bookmark Click on star and save That's it for now Thank you so much for watching this video And I will see you next time Thank you
